verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If יָק֤וּם <S%H6965><s%> ya-Kum If there arise בְּקִרְבְּךָ֙ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-be-Cha among נָבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> na-Vi, you a prophet א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or חֹלֵ֣ם <S%H2492><s%> cho-Lem or a dreamer חֲל֑וֹם <S%H2472><s%> cha-Lom; of dreams וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan and giveth אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about א֖וֹת <S%H226><s%> ot thee a sign א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or מוֹפֵֽת׃ <S%H4159><s%> mo-Fet. or a wonder

וּבָ֤א <S%H935><s%> u-Va come to pass הָאוֹת֙ <S%H226><s%> ha-'Ot And the sign וְהַמּוֹפֵ֔ת <S%H4159><s%> ve-ham-mo-Fet, or the wonder אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber whereof he spake אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; unto thee saying נֵֽלְכָ֞ה <S%H1980><s%> ne-le-Chah go אַחֲרֵ֨י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after אֱלֹהִ֧ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֛ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim other אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יְדַעְתָּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'-Tam which thou hast not known וְנָֽעָבְדֵֽם׃ <S%H5647><s%> ve-Na-'a-ve-Dem. and let us serve

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תִשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> tish-Ma', Thou shalt not hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei unto the words הַנָּבִ֣יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi of that prophet הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about חוֹלֵ֥ם <S%H2492><s%> cho-Lem or that dreamer הַחֲל֖וֹם <S%H2472><s%> ha-cha-Lom of dreams הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu; he כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מְנַסֶּ֞ה <S%H5254><s%> me-nas-Seh proveth יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, לָדַ֗עַת <S%H3045><s%> la-Da-'at, you to know הֲיִשְׁכֶ֤ם <S%H3426><s%> ha-yish-Chem whether ye אֹֽהֲבִים֙ <S%H157><s%> 'o-ha-Vim love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <S%H3824><s%> le-vav-Chem with all your heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-she-Chem.] and with all your soul

אַחֲרֵ֨י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God תֵּלֵ֖כוּ <S%H1980><s%> te-Le-chu along וְאֹת֣וֹ <S%H853><s%> ve-'o-To תִירָ֑אוּ <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra-'u; and fear וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִצְוֹתָ֤יו <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tav his commandments תִּשְׁמֹ֙רוּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> tish-Mo-ru him and keep וּבְקֹל֣וֹ <S%H6963><s%> u-ve-ko-Lo his voice תִשְׁמָ֔עוּ <S%H8085><s%> tish-Ma-'u, and obey וְאֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> ve-'o-To תַעֲבֹ֖דוּ <S%H5647><s%> ta-'a-Vo-du and ye shall serve וּב֥וֹ u-Vo תִדְבָּקֽוּן׃ <S%H1692><s%> tid-ba-Kun. him and cleave

וְהַנָּבִ֣יא <S%H5030><s%> ve-han-na-Vi And that prophet הַה֡וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or חֹלֵם֩ <S%H2492><s%> cho-Lem or that dreamer הַחֲל֨וֹם <S%H2472><s%> ha-cha-Lom of dreams הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he יוּמָ֗ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat, shall be put to death כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because דִבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> dib-ber- because he hath spoken סָ֠רָה <S%H5627><s%> Sa-rah to turn עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [you] away from the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God הַמּוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> ham-mo-Tzi which brought you out אֶתְכֶ֣ם׀ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz of the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt וְהַפֹּֽדְךָ֙ <S%H6299><s%> ve-hap-po-de-Cha and redeemed מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit you out of the house עֲבָדִ֔ים <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim, of bondage לְהַדִּֽיחֲךָ֙ <S%H5080><s%> le-had-di-cha-Cha to thrust מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech, thee out of the way אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוְּךָ֛ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-ve-Cha] commanded יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh] which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha] thy God לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet] to walk בָּ֑הּ Bah; וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <S%H1197><s%> u-vi-'ar-Ta] away הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra'] the evil מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> mik-kir-Be-cha.] from the midst

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki If יְסִֽיתְךָ֡ <S%H5496><s%> ye-si-te-Cha entice אָחִ֣יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha If thy brother בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אִ֠מֶּךָ <S%H517><s%> 'Im-me-cha of thy mother אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or בִנְךָ֨ <S%H1121><s%> vin-Cha or thy son אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or בִתְּךָ֜ <S%H1323><s%> vit-te-Cha or thy daughter א֣וֹ׀ <S%H176><s%> o or אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet or the wife חֵיקֶ֗ךָ <S%H2436><s%> chei-Ke-cha, of thy bosom א֧וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or רֵֽעֲךָ֛ <S%H7453><s%> re-'a-Cha or thy friend אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who כְּנַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> ke-naf-she-Cha which [is] as thine own soul בַּסֵּ֣תֶר <S%H5643><s%> bas-Se-ter thee secretly לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying נֵֽלְכָ֗ה <S%H1980><s%> ne-le-Chah, go וְנַֽעַבְדָה֙ <S%H5647><s%> ve-na-'av-Dah and serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim, other אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo] neither יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta,] which thou hast not known אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah] you וַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> va-'a-vo-Tei-cha.] thou nor thy fathers

מֵאֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> me-'e-lo-Hei [Namely] of the gods הָֽעַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, of the people אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vo-tei-Chem, which [are] round about הַקְּרֹבִ֣ים <S%H7138><s%> hak-ke-ro-Vim you nigh אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, about א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or הָרְחֹקִ֣ים <S%H7350><s%> ha-re-cho-Kim unto thee or far off מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Me-ka; at מִקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> mik-Tzeh from thee from the [one] end הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the earth וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against קְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> ke-Tzeh even unto the [other] end הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תֹאבֶ֣ה <S%H14><s%> to-Veh Thou shalt not consent ל֔וֹ lo, וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor תִשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> tish-Ma' unto him nor hearken אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav; about וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor תָח֤וֹס <S%H2347><s%> ta-Chos pity עֵֽינְךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-ne-Cha unto him neither shall thine eye עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, and וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor תַחְמֹ֥ל <S%H2550><s%> tach-Mol him neither shalt thou spare וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor תְכַסֶּ֖ה <S%H3680><s%> te-chas-Seh neither shalt thou conceal עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. and

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הָרֹג֙ <S%H2026><s%> ha-Rog But thou shalt surely תַּֽהַרְגֶ֔נּוּ <S%H2026><s%> ta-har-Gen-nu, kill יָֽדְךָ֛ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha him thine hand תִּֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> tih-yeh- become בּ֥וֹ bo בָרִֽאשׁוֹנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> va-ri-sho-Nah shall be first לַהֲמִית֑וֹ <S%H4191><s%> la-ha-mi-To; upon him to put him to death וְיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> ve-Yad the hand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of all the people בָּאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <S%H314><s%> ba-'a-cha-ro-Nah. and afterwards

וּסְקַלְתּ֥וֹ <S%H5619><s%> u-se-kal-To And thou shalt stone בָאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> va-'a-va-Nim him with stones וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> va-Met; that he die כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because בִקֵּ֗שׁ <S%H1245><s%> vik-Kesh, because he hath sought לְהַדִּֽיחֲךָ֙ <S%H5080><s%> le-had-di-cha-Cha to thrust thee away מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh from the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God הַמּוֹצִיאֲךָ֛ <S%H3318><s%> ham-mo-tzi-'a-Cha which brought thee out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim. of bondage

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, And all Israel יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> yish-me-'U shall hear וְיִֽרָא֑וּן <S%H3372><s%> ve-yi-ra-'Un; and fear וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and will never יוֹסִ֣פוּ <S%H3254><s%> yo-Si-fu no more לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot, and shall do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kad-da-Var any הָרָ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' such wickedness הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh such בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Be-cha. as this is among ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If תִשְׁמַ֞ע <S%H8085><s%> tish-Ma' If thou shalt hear בְּאַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> be-'a-Chat [say] in one עָרֶ֗יךָ <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei-cha, of thy cities אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten hath given לְךָ֛ le-Cha לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> la-She-vet thee to dwell שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. there saying

יָצְא֞וּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'U are gone out אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim men בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- the children בְלִיַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H1100><s%> ve-li-Ya-'al of Belial מִקִּרְבֶּ֔ךָ <S%H7130><s%> mik-kir-Be-cha, from among וַיַּדִּ֛יחוּ <S%H5080><s%> vai-yad-Di-chu you and have withdrawn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei the inhabitants עִירָ֖ם <S%H5892><s%> 'i-Ram of their city לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying נֵלְכָ֗ה <S%H1980><s%> ne-le-Chah, go וְנַעַבְדָ֛ה <S%H5647><s%> ve-na-'av-Dah and serve אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim other אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not יְדַעְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'-Tem. which ye have not known
